name: Winda Fab
overview:
Established in the year, 2010, we, ”Winda Fab India” have gained immense expertise in manufacturing, supplying, wholesaling and retailing a qualitative range of German uPVC Doors and Windows.

Our Products : Casement Doors & Windows Bay Poll System Windows Georgian Bar Windows Arc Window Casement Window Fix Window

Aim / Vision / Mission: “Our mission is to provide a variety of high-end wood products at very affordable prices to our honorable clients”

Team: To execute all the business related activities in an efficient manner, we have hired a team of diligent and sincere experts. Maintaining professionalism, these experts work in tandem with one another to carry out all the assigned tasks in a commendable way.

Our Infrastructure: We have established a sound infrastructure facility which aids us carrying out all the organizations goals in remarkable manner. Sprawling over a vast area, this infrastructure is divided into varied units that includes a manufacturing, quality testing and capacious warehousing unit.

Quality Assurance: Since inception, we have aimed to constantly improve the quality standards and offer a highly qualitative range much better than the product-line offer by our counterparts.

offices.address1: F17, Surya Arcade, National Road, Ghumar Mandi
